page.title: 07Employment
page.content: Employment on the land as farm workers, tenant or owner farmers can no longer be considered the principle occupation due to incresed agricultural automation. Many people now commute to Norwich (about 13 miles) Gt.Yarmouth (about 7 miles). The developement of the Oil business in the North Sea makes it the most significant industry. People are employed either as shift workers on rigs or onshore in the supporting trades and catering. The sugar beet factory at Cantley also provides jobs mainly on a seasonal basis from September to January. The factory processes beet from all over the Eastern half of Norfolk.
